chapters.title: Chapter 33: A Good Soup
chapters.info: Marille, p. 522—Seanchan damane captured by the Asha'man, now in Caemlyn. She, like many other damane, is convinced that she needs to be collared, to protect others. She is having great difficulty adjusting to life as a free woman, still referring to her self in the third person and such. She tells Gawyn about the bloodknives, and does not believe his assertion that he killed one of them.
